content.title: Samagra Samajik Suraksha Vridh Ashram Mai Nivaasarat Ant-vasi Pension Yojana
content.beneficiary: Citizens of Madhya Pradesh living in old age homes
content.details: Samagra Samajik Suraksha Vridh Ashram Mai Nivastan Athavasi Pension Yojana under the Department of Social Justice government of Madhya Pradesh provides financial support to the citizens of Madhya Pradesh who live in old age homes recognized by the Department of Social Justice.
eligibility: The applicant is a native of Madhya Pradesh.
The applicant Resident above 60 years of age residing in Vridvashram.
The applicant's name is marked on the Samagra portal.
content.application_process: Offline and Online. Applicants can apply for the scheme using the prescribed format and submitting the necessary documents either to the designated officer's office, the Gram Panchayat, or a Public Service Center.

faqs.question: What is Samagra Samajik Suraksha Vridh Ashram Mai Nivastan Athavasi Pension Yojana?
faqs.answer: Under this scheme, the Madhya Pradesh government provides financial support to the citizens who live in old age homes recognized by the Department of Social Justice.

faqs.question: What are the benefits of the scheme?
faqs.answer: The government of Madhya Pradesh gives a Pension of Rs. 600/- per month.

faqs.question: Is there an application fee?
faqs.answer: No, there are no application fees.

faqs.question: Is there a Caste-related Eligibility Criteria in this scheme?
faqs.answer: No, there are no caste-related criteria in this scheme.

faqs.question: What will be the age criteria?
faqs.answer: The applicant is above 60 years of age residing in Vridvashram.

faqs.question: What documents are required while applying?
faqs.answer: Three photos of himself Certificate for proof of age.

faqs.question: Under which department does this scheme come?
faqs.answer: Under the Department of Social Justice.

faqs.question: Can applicants from outside Madhya Pradesh apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: No, only Madhya Pradesh citizens have taken this scheme benefit.

faqs.question: What is samagra portal?
faqs.answer: Samagra Portal is the social security initiative by the Government of Madhya Pradesh for creating an integrated approach to shift from a conventional demand-based model of governance to an all-inclusive, holistic, proactive, and entitlement-based model.
